content: Can you provide an excel table that lists all the nouns and adjectives in the following sentence: "The lazy brown fox jumped over the fence"?

Sure! Below is an Excel-style table listing the nouns and adjectives in the sentence:

| Word Type | Word         |
|-----------|--------------|
| Noun      | fox          |
| Noun      | fence        |
| Adjective | lazy         |
| Adjective | brown        |

This table separates the nouns and adjectives from the sentence "The lazy brown fox jumped over the fence."
